sourcesContent:
<template>
{{isOpen}}
    <Suspense>
        <template #default>
            <single-shop v-if="isOpen == true"></single-shop>
        </template>
        <template #fallback>
            <single-shop-skeleton></single-shop-skeleton>
        </template>
    </Suspense>
</template>
<script>
import { ref } from '@vue/reactivity';
import SingleShop from './comps/SingleShop.vue'
import SingleShopSkeleton from './comps/skeleton/SingleShopSkeleton.vue'

export default {
    name: 'ShopPage',
    components: {
        SingleShop,
        SingleShopSkeleton,
    },
    setup() {
        const isOpen = ref(false);
        return {
            isOpen
        }
    },
     data() {
        return {
            show: false,
        };
    },
    methods: {
        setShow() {
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.isOpen = true;
                alert(this.isOpen)
            }, 2000);
        }
    },
    created() {
        
    },
    
}
</script>
